website_summaries.verdict: Parents seeking a hard-shell caddy will find their match in this unique diaper basket.
pros: Simple basket design ensures caddy is especially easy to carry and clean
Includes 5 interior pockets and showcases high-quality cotton lining
cons: A few owners wished the basket was smaller

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a multifunctional gift basket!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basket, it's a really nice size - it can easily fit diapers and ointments. I used it for a baby shower gift and filled it with a ton of great baby products. It's sturdy and bulky, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect! We use cloth diapers and cloth wipes with ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! We use cloth diapers and cloth wipes with this basket. The middle section that is intended for a disposable wipes container is perfect for 6-7 cloth diapers. (Folded one size pocket diapers.) There are also perfect size areas for a spray bottle of wipes solution and a stack of folded cloth wipes. I also keep a pack of disposable wipes and a few other small things in this basket. It's so perfect for grabbing and diapering somewhere like your living room so you don't have to go all the way to the changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore my diaper caddy. It's big enough to fit a pack of wipes in the middle. I have 2 in diapers and put different sizes on different sides. Love the little pockets too for things like diaper rash ointment tube, q-tips, and those gas relieving things. I don't move it much so the handle is not really useful, but it's easy to flip it down to the side of the basket. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lera B

customer_reviews.title: Cute in theory...but disappointing overall.
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea in theory. Unfortunately, my basket arrived damaged/broken in one of the corners. The bottom of the basket is also very rough, and extended use would create damage/scratching to any surface the diaper caddy sits on (such as a dresser or changing table shelf). Also, I do not quite understand the soft handle given the overall construction of this caddy.
customer_reviews.author: BArnold

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy basket and lots of useful compartments
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket, looks just as pictured. I use it to help organize/corral all the diapering essentials, cloths, and toys in the living room that come with a baby. Helps keep some semblance of order and that adults do in fact live here too. Sturdy basket and compartments of varying sizes with small compartments along one side of the basket helps keep everything organized and tidy looking. Compartment divisions are reinforced so they maintain their shape. Would definitely purchase again, especially for the gift basket ideas which are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver!! I knew I wanted a diaper caddy but I have used this all day everyday. It stores my diapers, wipes, diaper cream, my medication (after delivery when I needed it near me), extra baby socks, a few toys, pacifiers, breast pads... I would be doing so much more running around if I didn't have this! I will probably use it for a long time. The basket is also really cute and the insert comes out and can be washed. We used the basket with a blanket in itfor some pictures too!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Large
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a high quality basket and is aesthetically pleasing, but it's huge. I realized it is large enough to fit a few bottles of shampoo, lotion, diapers, wipes, wash clothes, etc... Really all you need in a diaper caddy is space for diapers, wipes, and a tube of diaper cream. This is better served stationary to store a bunch of items instead of lugging it around the house. The handle folds down which is nice for storing, but it actually becomes a bit unsteady when the basket is full. I use my less expensive Eddie Bauer diaper caddy from Target instead.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great size. All of the compartments are just right and there are the perfect number for all of baby's needs. Looks great! I love that you can remove the insert later and keep using the basket too.
customer_reviews.author: ugateal

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this basket to place in my parents house when I visit with my little baby. It's bigger than I thought and fits everything that I need! I would definitely recommend this product if you want a very nice looking basket. I also have the Eddie Bauer changing organizer which is more compact and modern looking (we keep that one in our living room area).  One thing I would like to note is that the handle is actually not wick material. It's more a foam/fake leather.
customer_reviews.author: aweelicious

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive yet elegant basket!
customer_reviews.text: Classy basket. Handle folds down and it's sized just right. Big enough to hold stuff yet small enough to carry from room to room. I used it as a gift basket to stuff lots of smaller baby gifts into and tied a fancy bow on it. Friend loved it.
customer_reviews.author: CajsaToo

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second I've purchased (the first was at Target) (this is for second baby) and I love this basket and use it daily! On top of holding everything I need it to, it is so easy to pick up and carry downstairs if I need to or we just pick it up as is and carry it on all of our trips!! It holds quite a few diapers plus creams, first aid, the box of wipes, etc. It is well-made and convenient. I highly recommend this Munchkin diaper caddy!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Wish i would of tried it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 2 other diaper caddies that I just didn't like before trying this one and I cannot believe I didn't try it sooner! It holds everything I want in it and actually keeps it organized unlike the other caddies I have tried. It holds alot of diapers which i like so you dont have to always be filling it up. It will now be my go to baby shower gift for new moms because it is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this as a diaper caddy. We did not get a changing table and this works out great to go between the family room and our bedroom. It’s cute, lightweight, durable and so practical. I would highly recommend this diaper caddy.
customer_reviews.author: WIPA88

customer_reviews.title: Great basket
customer_reviews.text: I love this basket! You can fit so much in it and it looks nice. I have one for upstairs and one for downstairs. Took one star away because the baskets that I ordered are different in color from the picture. I even tried replacing one. One is dark like the picture and the other one is a tad bit later.
customer_reviews.author: maxdmia

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and fits the OXO wipe dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I really like the OXO wipe dispenser but I had a very time finding a caddy that fit the dispenser. I think I ordered 4 caddies and finally, this one did it. The basket is adorable and functional. Very happy to have this on my changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E

customer_reviews.title: we are so glad the lining has held up well
customer_reviews.text: This item has been a DREAM. We have a two story house (nursery and changing table are upstairs in the nursery), so we keep this downstairs. It allows us to quickly do diaper changes anywhere downstairs without running around with a stinky, wet baby OR having diapers, wipes and butt paste all over the place. It is quite spacious so we also store an extra onesie in case of blowout and extra burp cloths. We've had this for a few months and the waffle weave lining has remained in place and very clean despite multiple times/day use, we are so glad the lining has held up well!
customer_reviews.author: ehmon

customer_reviews.title: gift for new mom
customer_reviews.text: great size to keep the essentials handy....can carry from room to room easily and looks decorative in the beautiful basket
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this basket
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this basket! We keep it in our living room to organize all of babies things! We use the large "wipes" section for cloth diapers and keep one of the smaller "designer" boxes of Huggies wipes in one of the smaller sections. In the other small sections we have bibs, burp cloths, a few disposables. In the tiny slip pockets we keep thermometers, nail clippers, diaper cream, etc. organizes everything perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: mommyofONE :)

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for storing baby food, spoons, extra bibs, etc. since I do not have a lot of storage in my kitchen. I love this! The strap is like leather and it folds over so you can just see the basket if you'd like to place it on a changing table. It's got impressive storage for its size and the compartments are intuitive: as in, they're right-sized for the types of items you'd store. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: The compartments are great, and store about 15 diapers in the "newborn" ...
customer_reviews.text: This basket is soooo cute and convenient to store diaper supplies. The compartments are great, and store about 15 diapers in the "newborn" size. The middle section is perfect for wipes, and we have various items in the other cubes (diaper cream, hand sanitizer etc.). I would definitely recommend this product to a friend or for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this basket
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this basket! It's portable and the compartments are just the right size for everything I need (diapers, wipes, rash cream, burp cloths, etc)! I also love buying these baskets and filling them up as cute baby shower gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Dakshesh Patel

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this caddy! It is so handy that I have 2 of them.... 1 in the nursery and 1 in the family room next to the pack-n-play where my baby girl naps and hangs out. It's the perfect size and fits all the baby essentials - diapers, wipes, Boogie Wipes, butt cream, lotion, nail clippers, thermometer, rattle, etc. Bonus points to Munchkin for making this basket pleasing to the eye so it fits right in to any room.
customer_reviews.author: 7Lil

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love this basket
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this basket. Defiantly a must in our house, my husband couldn't believe how nicely it keeps everything together right in reach for everything he could need while diapering.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your new baby!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the homey design of this organizer and we have gotten tons of use with this portable caddy. The movable handle is a leather type material so a bit flexible (we keep it in the down position when not in transit). There's room for plenty of diapers and all your lotions/sprays!
customer_reviews.author: MinimalistMomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I loved mine and have now made this my go to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the sixth Sara Bear diaper caddy I've bought. I loved mine and have now made this my go to baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: honeysuckle75

customer_reviews.title: BIG Basket!
customer_reviews.text: Great size. It is a little too big to use at the feet of of baby on our stand-alone changing table, but it will work really well on top of our baby dresser (which we also use as a changing table). Holds wipes, diapers, and has 4 small pockets for all the diaper creams we have. No major complaints here.. one small issue is that the logo tag from Sarahbear company is sewn a little crooked on the basket liner.. but we plan to turn that side of the basket toward the wall.
customer_reviews.author: A_Mom

customer_reviews.title: adorable basket, very useful
customer_reviews.text: adorable basket, very useful. the bottom has several hard pieces of wood that made scratches on several pieces of furniture before we realized. now we keep it on top of a folded receiving blanket with no issues- but the furniture is permanently damaged. could easily fix it with some felt pads, but I have a newborn- who's got the time?
customer_reviews.author: Jennnifer M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice caddy
customer_reviews.text: Nice caddy - have one in baby's room and one in living room to hold diaper changing needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute on the dresser & holds a lot of supplies and keeps everything organized. It's gender neutral which was important to me. Good quality. You can carry it around the house. It's very reasonably priced considering it's a storage piece and it looks decorative at the same time
customer_reviews.author: S. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Love all the compartments but the handle is very light ...
customer_reviews.text: Love all the compartments but the handle is very light and flimsy and seems all the contents would fall out of the basket if you carried it around. Would rather have something sturdier
customer_reviews.author: Deenie

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the handle to also be made of the same material as the rest of the basket, but it wasn't. This was okay, though, and in the end, I kind of like it this way. The section in the middle perfectly fits a box of wipes, and the rest of the area is divided into sections that fit any other accessories. It's both functional and aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Does Its Job
customer_reviews.text: Large capacity caddy with lots of side pockets to cram stuff into. It's lightweight and would be easy to carry around (but I leave it in one spot). Not the most luxe caddy out there but the price is right (e.g., the waffle liner is thin and wicker is not the most durable). Good purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: AKL

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well over time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 4 years ago and am still using it. The fabric is a bit beat up but the basket has held up remarkably well, despite being kicked constantly by both my boys.
customer_reviews.author: CTshopper

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I love my diaper caddy! Large enough to fit whatever you need yet small enough to slip under an end table. Very high quality materials!
customer_reviews.author: lora dumler

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hasn't arrived yet, but I think I will really love this caddy. I have it on her dresser next to the changing pad and I love that everything is easy to get at. I had the jj cole caddy w the drawer for my son & liked it, but it was never large enough to hold all that I needed on the changing table. This one, I can always have a hand on her while I get something. It's very sweet, especially for a little girls nursery. :) love that the handle folds down too!
customer_reviews.author: carebear80

customer_reviews.title: Awesome / Must Have Item
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is a must have, we are thinking about buying another one to have two in the house. It fits plenty of must have items when it comes to changing a baby and it is very sturdy and durable. It looks great, works great and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Tito Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: I really like this diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diaper caddy. It looks great in the baby's room, and is gender neutral. I appreciate that it will match any decor, unlike many of the printed caddys I have seen. Pros: 1. It looks great. 2. The cloth is a great material. It provides enough give to squeeze things in, but is firm enough to hold them upright. 3. It provides plenty of space. 4. The sections are divided well proportionally. It has a great space for wipes that is easy to access, and plenty of room for diapers and other baby gadgets. Cons: 1. The handle is flimsy. Overall, I recommend this diaper caddy and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our downstairs changing table. Lots of compartments to fit diapers, burp cloths, wipes, ointments, powder, hand sanitizer, a change of clothes, etc. Since it stays in one place in our house, I don't know how it would hold up if we carried it around and used the handle... seems a bit flimsy to me. It's perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda B

customer_reviews.title: My second sarabear caddy
customer_reviews.text: I got a pink and green sarabear caddy three years ago when my first daughter was born, and it is finally falling apart now. I was hoping to find another pink one for the new baby, but I ended up with the white. I was worried that it would look too boring, but it's really cute... the white waffle weave makes it look a little like a spa set, and of course, it will go with any decor. Now, I'm glad I chose this one instead of another pink.
customer_reviews.author: Veggie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great basket
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and plenty of room to organize your items. Mine came with a highlighter mark on it... otherwise great product
customer_reviews.author: CaliDenae

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This basket is cute, but it doesn't have as much space as I thought by looking at the pictures and posts of others. Also I didn't realize the handle wouldn't be as flexible as it is...doesn't quite feel as sturdy as I would like. This will definitely still get the job done though.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love having this downstairs
customer_reviews.text: Love having this downstairs, makes changing the diaper so easy. This was a much better price then the one i had registered for even though it's the same one!
customer_reviews.author: gina soroush

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product--it's so nice to have a diaper changing station that I can take with me throughout the house. I'm not having to run back and forth to the nursery to change each diaper. This one holds its shape well and has nice structure while still remaining lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made diaper caddy. Several very practical dividers to store diapers and smaller items (creams, etc). What more do you need! White waffle pattern goes with most any nursery decor.
customer_reviews.author: 3BoysV816

customer_reviews.title: The perfect diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: This is the only diaper basket we could find that would fit the Oxo Tot Wipes Dispenser and it happens to be very durable and attractive (would go with most any decor). There is room for plenty of diapers, lotions, and smaller pockets for things like nail clippers. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristeenie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome my daughter & son-in-law love it for our twin granddaughters!
customer_reviews.author: Magdalen Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use in the bedroom as a second diaper station. Cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: But I actually like it quite a lot
customer_reviews.text: I had reservations buying this because of the price. But I actually like it quite a lot. It's very portable and fits all of babies diaper changing things and more.I still think it's a bit costly..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice in the living room
customer_reviews.text: This basket is very cute! Prior to this we were using a plastic tub you get from the hospital when you get discharged to carry all your stuff in. This is much cuter and more functional. It's nice to have all the pockets to help organize and make finding/grabbing thing with one hand as you're changing your little one very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Jaros

customer_reviews.title: A perfect Baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive basket that has just the right number of compartments for baby's product needs. It's deep enough, and strong enough, to support bottles and diapers. Bought as a gift for my daughter's first baby and she is delighted with it. I'd reccomend this as a baby gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Woods

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used the product, but makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I use a different portable diaper caddy, but I like this one as well. It has a lots of space and lots of organization pockets. Reason I didn't love it, is because it doesn't come with a changing pad. Other than that, I love giving it as a gift. I like to fill it with diapers, wipes, diaper balm, lotions, body wash, a cute outfit and other little things that new moms will need. It makes a great gift basket that holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Janson

customer_reviews.title: Over a year later and it's still holding up super well!
customer_reviews.text: The center does fit a wipe container, but I use it to hold diapers as we have a wipe warmer. Over a year later and it's still holding up super well!! It has plenty of storage space and extra inside pockets to store little things- nail clippers, nail files, etc. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful basket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful sturdy basket. I used it as a baby shower gift loading it with lotions, powders, sleepers and more. Finished it off with some beautiful flowing bows which gave it a nice touch. Everyone made a comment about the basket!
customer_reviews.author: D. Foss

customer_reviews.title: great caddy
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for 3 years now. This is not just perfect for babies but still very usable for toddlers. I will probably have it for another year or 2. I plan on gifting these to new moms as well.
customer_reviews.author: alexis davison

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Whether you get this diaper caddy or a different one, get a diaper caddy! This thing has been great for us. Love the compartments, that you can store not just wipes and diapers but cream, burp rags or whatever else you want to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Voit

customer_reviews.title: Good for by the bed at night and to carry ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for moving from room to room. Good for by the bed at night and to carry downstairs during the day. Roomy with plenty of room for diapers & wipes & other incidentals.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper caddy! It’s so roomy and we’ll-made! There is a place to put everything you need to change a baby! It looks old fashioned and modern at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: which is great! I love all the different sections and pockets ...
customer_reviews.text: This was larger than I thought it would be, which is great! I love all the different sections and pockets that it has. It is very versatile. It seems sturdy and durable, and the cover is easy to remove if it needs to be washed. I am looking forward to using this once our baby arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product I'm going to now buy one for every baby shower I either throw or attend. I actually wish this was out when my other two kids were in need of diapering. I particularly love the compact size plus all of the little compartments inside. I can fit 10 size 3 diapers on the left-hand side pack of wipes plus lotion Vaseline and any other cream or bomb I need in the pockets on the right side. Such a perfect little diaper caddy basket and so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Lau

customer_reviews.title: Spa-like diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: This diaper caddy is modern and fresh with the white waffle fabric against the espresso-colored basket. I was looking for a diaper organizer for our family room and this one is the perfect size with nice compartments. On one side I can fit 15 size 2 diapers which is plenty for daytime use. I was also able to fix an Oxo wipes box in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing diapers and supplies!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing diapers for my two kiddos when I want to change them downstairs rather than go up to the nursery. Cute, stylish, portable.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Jo

customer_reviews.title: Looks very beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This keeps me organized during disper changes. Looks very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Baby Shower Gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gift you can give someone for a baby shower. I have gifted this exact basket over 10 times and always receive thanks and praise for this lovely gift. I fill it will all the essentials and don't even need to buy a gift bag.
customer_reviews.author: smein

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but too big
customer_reviews.text: This basket is very nice for your changing station. But it is a lot larger than I realized, so I ended up sending it back to purchase something a little smaller. Quality was nice (munchkin always is!). It was just too big for my changing table set up.
customer_reviews.author: CMS294

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: I keep this on top of my changing table and I have used it since day 1: Pros: -Goes nicely with espresso/chocolate furniture -Several pockets - Easy to move/carry Cons: -Handle is made of material and often doesn't stay up
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: I love the way this looks
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this looks. Super cute and looking forward to using it around the house when needed! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: nice large diaper caddy!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these diaper caddies and I love them. I do however think that the quality has gone down every so slightly since Munchkin obviously bought the design from Sarabear (I have one Munchkin version and one older one). The compartments are great sizes and I love it for next to my bed especially when baby is very new!
customer_reviews.author: Leah A

customer_reviews.title: Diverse
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS product. I like that even after you're done with it for diapers you can use it for other things. Diverse.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Baird

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper Caddy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT diaper caddy - I keep it downstairs as my nursery is upstairs. I love all the pockets and space in this caddy. It's also nice looking to boot! I keep wipes in a wipe box, diapers, pacifiers, medicines and rash ointment all in this basket. It's truly great!
customer_reviews.author: abd

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Super durable and not flimsy. It works great on the changing table and helps keep everything organized. Light weight. Good product for the price. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney McCombs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and holds a lot of produts, i just wish it fit our wipes warmer.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great gift for families going from room to room or ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a baby shower. This is a great gift for families going from room to room or to leave at grandmas house!
customer_reviews.author: B4Me

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice !
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much I ordered a second one when the first one broke
customer_reviews.author: cahnfused

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how I lived without this diaper caddy.
customer_reviews.text: This diaper caddy is so handy. We pack it full and carry it from our living room during the day and the bedroom at night. It's also very cute and will easily be repuporsed once we out grow diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Simply the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I just love it! I think this one a very few products i gave 5 stars. Very smartly made, tons of pockets for everything and super lightweight. And it's so cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Avital S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect diaper caddy! Fits all the necessities and then some for all diaper and baby needs.. lots of compartments and pockets and easy to transport, great qualiy!
customer_reviews.author: L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: All of the compartments are great for organization. I can keep everything I would need for diaper changes and nursing all in one space and easily transport it around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Kashif

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a portable changing supply basket for our ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a portable changing supply basket for our bedroom while our baby is co-sleeping in our room. Keeps wipes and diapers organized and it's a cute basket!
customer_reviews.author: VAS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this basket and have used it every day since coming home from the hospital
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite caddy
customer_reviews.text: I really love this diaper caddy and have bought extras as gifts. Holds a lot. Very stylish, i hate the little plastic looking ones. Handle is soft as folds down.
customer_reviews.author: K.Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good product just not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for so we can move items with one hand from room to room if needed. However, I didn't realize the handle is just a fake leather strap. I was hoping it was a hard handle so it would be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: #BeHonest

customer_reviews.title: Chic and useful
customer_reviews.text: Looks chic in my nursery and has lots of useful compartments for organizing.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C

customer_reviews.title: Nice caddy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a shower gift. Cute as it could be! Good construction & sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JtG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to hold all of your supplies and cart with you from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: jessicapetty84

customer_reviews.title: Easy and compact for my living room
customer_reviews.text: Great for my living room and good for quick organization that would typically be scattered on a table over time. I like the wipes box compartment and the small pockets on the side for his vitamin d bottle and dropper.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 10 months and I found that over time the wicker part of the basket came apart very easily. I LOVE the fact that you can take out the fabric part and wash it. But be careful that you don't dry it in the dryer, it shrinks a little.
customer_reviews.author: Kimaura

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket. A must have for all new moms. I'm all over my house with my baby so it helps to have a portable diaper carrier that holds diapers, wipes,lotion,powder and a few other things you might need
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Cute and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: High Quality. Great to organize your baby items, though it was a little smaller than I thought it would be. It is a cute way to keep all of your baby needs handy without looking cluttered and disorganized.
customer_reviews.author: Michal Dedon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the newborn stage when needing to change diapers ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed! Perfect for the newborn stage when needing to change diapers in different room! Still love it now at over a year! Best shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 2 story home this is a MUST purchase! I needed a diaper changing station for upstairs as well as downstairs and this helped me keep things very organized. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this caddy and have purchased it for two other ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this caddy and have purchased it for two other friends now, as well. It holds plenty, looks nice, and is easily portable throughout the house. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best caddy out there
customer_reviews.text: Best caddy out there!! I ordered few returned them this one you can't go wrong it is beautiful and it holds plenty. Would buy for future moms as baby shower gift a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Rusmir

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cute and sort of country antique looking it's great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cute and sort of country antique looking it's great! And fits a lot plus if you want more room or to clean the white fabric it's removable :)
customer_reviews.author: Moshe B.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking diaper caddy and holds all the diapering products ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking diaper caddy and holds all the diapering products you need for diaper changes. The middle compartment fits a hard shell wipes box nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good Caddy
customer_reviews.text: The handle seems a little flimsy, but overall a good diaper caddy. Wipes fit perfectly in the middle and it can hold a lot of diapers on the sides. There are also small little pockets where diaper rash cream tuck nicely into. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TLW

customer_reviews.title: Compartments are too small for diapers
customer_reviews.text: The basket is sturdy. There are lots of compartments. I was hoping to put diapers in the actual caddy but the compartments are only big enough to fit newborn diapers or maybe size 1. The handle is actually a flexible leather strap.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Piche

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT  - Parent Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect portable diaper caddy. We have this along with a changing pad on the first floor of the house so we can easily change baby downstairs. We use this caddy over 5 times each day.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Caddy for Nursery
customer_reviews.text: Well made caddy. The insert is soft and the same material is used on the middle of the handle (cute extra touch). There are enough compartments to hold multiple diapers, creams/ lotions, hand sanitizer and a large pocket for a wipes caddy. It holds a lot and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lilypad

customer_reviews.title: Durable and decorative!
customer_reviews.text: Decorative with the weave design, and durable enough to stay in the living room for years!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Great caddy, but not really brown
customer_reviews.text: Love this caddy. The basket is sturdy, the liner is nice with good size compartments... but I took away one star because my basket is so dark it might as well be black! Definitely not the brown as pictured on Amazon or the package it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Cronck

product_meta.title: Munchkin Portable Diaper Caddy, White
product_meta.description:
Be ready to take all of your diapering needs from one room to the next with the stylish and portable Diaper Caddy Organizer by Munchkin. Each caddy starts with a custom shaker-style basket in a tight weave of real wood. A collapsible handle is attached on either end, and a heavyweight, 100% cotton liner completes the sleek, sophisticated design. Keep everything where you need it, when you need it - the basket has enough storage space to hold a baby wipes container, diapers, ointments, burp cloths and swabs. Makes a great baby shower gift and can also be used as a base to build your own gift basket.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Each SaraBear Diaper Caddy by Munchkin starts with a custom shaker style basket in a tight weave of real wood. A handle is attached on either end of the basket and can be collapsed to lie along the side of the basket. Each liner is made from a heavy-weight, 100% cotton fabric. The basket will firmly hold a baby wipes container, and has pockets for diapers, ointments, burp cloths and swabs. The caddies are PVC free and the dyes used in the textiles are entirely formaldehyde-free. Any wood stain that is used on a SaraBear basket is water-based and lead-free. The packaging was deliberately designed without the use of plastics. At a moment's notice or a baby's cry, take everything you need to care for baby from one room to the next.
feature_bullets: Portable diaper caddy with 5 compartments to store diapers, wipes, ointments, and more
Designed by a mom to be both stylish and practical
Functional and stylish for any room of the house
Makes a great gift or a base as a gift basket
